content.raw: The fix looks good to me, didn't test on OSX but checked that everything still works on Bionic.
content.html: The fix looks good to me, didn't test on OSX but checked that everything still works on Bionic.

update.description:
issue #2531 - the blank grey window problem described in this issue seems to be related to [QTBUG-71044](https://bugreports.qt.io/browse/QTBUG-71044), which supposedly was fixed in Qt 5.12. I tried setting the env variable mentioned in the qt issue,`QT_MAC_WANTS_LAYER`, and found that it fixes the problem for gzclient. Tested on Mojave with Qt 5.12.

The changes in Scene.cc fixes camera orbit control on retina displays.
update.title: Mojave + Qt 5.12 gzclient fixes

content.raw:
xenial CI is not happy; I believe `QVersionNumber` was added in qt 5.6:

* https://www.ics.com/blog/whats-new-qt-560-qversionnumber

and xenial uses qt 5.5

* https://packages.ubuntu.com/xenial/qtbase5-dev
content.html:
xenial CI is not happy; I believe QVersionNumber was added in qt 5.6:

  • https://www.ics.com/blog/whats-new-qt-560-qversionnumber

and xenial uses qt 5.5

  • https://packages.ubuntu.com/xenial/qtbase5-dev
